Published October 29 2014

LOCO

LOCO — Taco Bell has replaced their home page with the message: “the new way to Taco Bell isn’t on the internet, it’s on #onlyintheapp.” Bold and crazy. The app currently sits at #21 and #180 on the “Top Free” lists for the App Store and Google Play respectively.

Enjoy your day.
